This page is an overview of my Research projects.

Contact Tracing with iBeacons

Using Cloud and iBeacons to detect potential exposure to COVID.


Food detection App for Diabetics

Using ML and Computer Vision to detect food in order to help Diabetics track their nutritional intake.
